name: Ocean View Resort
description: A luxurious resort with stunning ocean views, private beach access, and top-notch amenities.

name: Mountain Escape Lodge
description: A cozy lodge nestled in the mountains, perfect for a peaceful getaway with hiking and skiing nearby.

name: City Center Hotel
description: A modern hotel located in the heart of the city, offering easy access to popular attractions and business centers.

name: Lakefront Inn
description: A charming inn situated on the lakefront, offering beautiful views and relaxing atmosphere.

name: Desert Oasis Resort
description: An exclusive resort in the desert, featuring luxurious accommodations, a spa, and fine dining.
